original_title: 妻が女友達と行った旅行で知らない男にナンパされていた。
overview: My wife went on a trip with her best friend Yuzu-chan. Worrying, I told her to report every detail and happily sent her off. When I called her wife at night, I heard a noisy voice. I heard a man's voice. She became suspicious of his wife, who hastily hung up the phone. And I can't get in touch with her wife even after dawn.
title: Some Guy I Don’t Know Picked Up My Wife On A Trip She Went To With Her Lady Friends.
